name: get-zipcode
description: Gets the details of a single Zip code.

$ul: **data**: Zip Code Data Model
**cityAliases**: Array that contains all the city aliases for the given zip code.
**countyFipsCode**: FIPS code assigned to the county of the main city of the zip code.
**divisionCode**: Division Code. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.
**divisionName**: Division Name. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.
**landAreaKm2**: Zip Code Land Area in square kilometers.
**landAreaMi2**: Zip Code Land area in Square Miles
**latitude**: Zip Code Latitude
**longitude**: Zip Code Longitude
**msaCode**: 5 digit MSA (Metropolitan Statistical Area) code.
**msaName**: Name of the defined MSA code.
**regionCode**: Region Code. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.
**regionName**: Region Name. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.
**stateAbbr**: Abbreviation for state name.
**stateCode**: Standard 2 character state code.
**stateFipsCode**: Federal Information Processing Standards 2 digit assigned code.
**stateName**: State Name
**titleCaseCityName**: USPS City / Town Name for the main city of the zip code. Title Case Format.
**titleCaseCountyName**: Main County Name in Title Case
**uniqueZipNameInd**: True = Unique Zip Code Name. False the zip code name is not unique.
**uspsCarrierRouteRateSortDesc**: Description for the carrier route code.
**uspsCarrierRouteSortCode**: Code for the available carrier route.

**uspsCityMailingInd**: City names with the City State Mailing Name indicator flag set to True are considered part of a complete and standardized address; city names with the flag set to false  file should not be used in a complete and standardized address.
**uspsCountyName**: Name of the county of the main city for the zip code.
**uspsDeliveryCode**: Determines if the zip code city has Carrier Routes.
**uspsDeliveryDesc**: Determines if the zip code city has Carrier Routes.

**uspsFacilityCode**: Facility code provided by the USPS. B=Branch, C=Community Post Office, N = Non-Postal Community Name, former postal facility or place name, P= Post Office, S=Station, U = Urbanization
**uspsFacilityName**: USPS Facility Name  B=Branch, C=Community Post Office, N = Non-Postal Community Name, former postal facility or place name, P= Post Office, S=Station, U = Urbanization
**uspsFinanceNumber**: USPS Provided Finance Number. This code is assigned to postal service facilities.
**uspsMainCityKey**: USPS City / Town key identifier for the main city of the zip code.
**uspsMainCityName**: USPS City / Town Name for the main city of the zip code. USPS Upper Case Format.
**waterAreaKm2**: Zip Code water area in Square kilometers.
**waterAreaMi2**: Zip Code Water Area in Square Miles
**zipClassificationCode**: Code provided by USPS for the type of Zip Code it represents.  P = PO Box Zip, U = Unique Zip, M = APO/FPO Military Zip , null (not provided by USPS),N = Non-Unique Zip.
**zipClassificationDesc**: Description of the zip classification code.   P = PO Box Zip, U = Unique Zip, M = APO/FPO Military Zip , null (not provided by USPS), = Non-Unique Zip.
**zipCode**: 5 Digit Zip Code. Zone Improvement Plan.
**zipCodeStatistics**: Available statistics by year of the Zip Code.
**links**: API Response Links
**first**: Link to the first group of records from API call.
**last**: Link to last set of records from API call.
**next**: Link to next set of results from API call.
**prev**: Link to the previous set of records from API call.
**self**: Link to this response.

$block: List of Errors generated by the request.

$ul: **errors**: Errors Array
**message**
**statusCode**
**message**
**statusCode**
